title: Please can someoneidentify this font
content:
am currently looking to recreate a logo for a client but unfortunatly not been able to match the font.   
   
Can any of you talented guys and ladies out there help me?!   
   
Heres a gif with selected characters.   
   
(PLEASE COPY AND PASTE URL BELOW INTO BROWSER. DO NOT CLICK ON LINK!)   
   
 [http://www.geocities.com/freeeky/char\_select.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425022458/http:/www.geocities.com/freeeky/char_select.gif)   
   
   
Thanks   
 ![char_select.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425022458im_/http:/www.typophile.com/cgibin/board-post.pl?action=posting_upload_form&what=show&img=51420)
author: anonymous
